document_data.caption: The bard Nuial Treestrider walking down a garden street in Loudwater.
document_data.name: Nuial Treestrider
document_data.mainbody: '''Nuial Treestrider''' was a [[half-elf]] [[bard]] of the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was also a [[Scion of the Green Regent]].{{Cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/"Dark Exodus" Plot Recap}}
document_data.History: At the ceremony for the choosing of the [[Green Regent]] on [[Shieldmeet]] of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Nuial was among the volunteers and was accepted as a Scion.{{Cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/What is the Green Regent}}
document_data.Activities: A minstrel, he entertained at many taverns and other venues in the area.
document_data.Personality: Nuial loved the city and, despite his position as a Scion, had no taste for getting into any adventures in the wilderness. He tended to get lost in his music and fellow bard [[Teseryne Truesilver]] considered him a bit vapid and touched in the head, but liked him nevertheless.
document_data.Description: His eyes were hazel and his hair was sandy blond. He wore a [[tunic]] that was powder blue and [[hose]] that were seafoam green. He played the [[lyre]] and was armed with a [[dagger]] at his belt. While a Scion of the Green Regent, Nuial bore the holy symbol of [[Mielikki]] upon his brow, glowing emerald.
